where OHA01 = #{oha01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select oha01,SMYDESC,oha02,oha03,occ02,oha08,oha14,gen02,oha15,gem02,OHA99,OHACONF,oha55,ohapost,oha10,#{centre} centre from ${centre}.OHA_FILE left join ${centre}.SMY_FILE on smyslip = substr(oha01,0,4) left join ${centre}.OCC_FILE on occ01 = oha03 left join ${centre}.gem_file on gem01 = oha15 left join ${centre}.gen_file on gen01 = oha14
and lower(oha01) like lower('%${code}%')
and lower(oha99) like lower('%${multiTradeCode}%')
